analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to //

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad pa /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ro //
translated: will believe in this profound perfection of wisdom.

original: gsol pa / bcom @31a *//
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom @31a *//
translated: Subh≈´ti said, ‚ÄúBlessed One,

analyzed: ldan 'das / ji tsam gyis na /
translated: BhagavƒÅn,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba lags /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba lags /
translated: to what extent do bodhisattva mahƒÅsattvas practice the six perfections, plant the roots of virtue, serve many buddhas, and are accepted by spiritual friends?‚Äù

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The BhagavƒÅn replied,

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: ‚ÄúSu¬≠bh≈´ti, this is how bodhisattva mahƒÅsattvas, when practicing the transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: gzugs su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩgzugs kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: gzugs su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / gzugs kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: do not form mental constructs or concepts about physical forms.üîΩThey do not form mental constructs or concepts about the causal attributes of physical forms.

original: gzugs kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩtshor bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩtshor ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: gzugs kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / tshor bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / tshor ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the essential nature of physical forms.üîΩThey do not form mental constructs or concepts about feelings.üîΩThey do not form mental constructs or concepts about the causal attributes of feelings.

original: tshor ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: tshor ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the essential nature of feelings.

original: 'du shes su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩ'du shes kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: 'du shes su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / 'du shes kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about perceptions.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the characteristics of perceptions.

original: 'du shes kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of perceptions.

original: 'du byed du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩ'du byed kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam bar mi rtog go /
analyzed: 'du byed du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / 'du byed kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam bar mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about formative predispositions.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the characteristics of formative predispositions.

original: 'du byed kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of formative predispositions.

original: rnam par shes par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩrnam par shes pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam par shes par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about consciousness.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the characteristics of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of consciousness.

original: mig tu mi rtog rnam par mi rtog @31b go ;mig gi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: mig tu mi rtog rnam par mi rtog @31b go ;mig gi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the eyes. They do not think or conceptualize about the characteristics of the eyes.

original: mig gi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩrna bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: mig gi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / rna bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the eyes.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the ears.

original: rna ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rna ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the characteristics of the ears.

original: rna ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rna ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the ears.

original: snar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩsna'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: snar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / sna'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /

original: sna'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: sna'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the nose.

original: lcer mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩlce'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: lcer mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / lce'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the tongue.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the characteristics of the tongue.

original: lce'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: lce'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the tongue.

original: lus su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩlus kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: lus su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / lus kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /

original: lus kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: lus kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the body.

original: yid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: yid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / yid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /

original: yid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩgzugs su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: yid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / gzugs su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the mind.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about forms.

original: gzugs kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: gzugs kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the characteristics of forms.

original: gzugs kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: gzugs kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of form.

original: sgrar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩsgra'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: sgrar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / sgra'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about sound.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the characteristics of sound.

original: sgra'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: sgra'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of sound.

original: drir mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: drir mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about smell.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the characteristics of smell.

original: dri'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go ;dri'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: dri'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go ;dri'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of smell.

original: ror mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩro'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: ror mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / ro'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about taste.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the characteristics of taste.

analyzed: ro'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / reg tu mi rtog rnam par @32a *//
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of taste.

original: mi rtog go /üîΩreg gi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: mi rtog go / reg gi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about touch.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the characteristics of touch.

analyzed: reg gi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / chos su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /

original: chos kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: chos kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /

original: chos kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: chos kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not conceptualize or think about the nature of phenomena.

original: mig gi rnam par shes par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩmig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not conceptualize or think about the nature of eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩrna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not conceptualize or think about ear consciousness.üîΩThey do not conceptualize or think about the characteristics of ear consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not conceptualize or think about the nature of ear consciousness.

original: sna'i rnam par shes par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩsna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not conceptualize or think about nose consciousness.üîΩThey do not conceptualize or think about the characteristics of nose consciousness.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not conceptualize or think about the nature of nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not conceptualize or think about tongue consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the defining characteristics of the tongue consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩlus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the body consciousness.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the defining characteristics of the body consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the body consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes par mi rtog @32b rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩyid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes par mi rtog @32b rnam par mi rtog go / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the mind consciousness.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the defining characteristics of the mind consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩmig gi 'dus te reg par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / mig gi 'dus te reg par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the mind consciousness.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the contact that arises from the coming together of the eye, a visible object, and eye consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the defining characteristics of the contact that arises from the coming together of the eye, a visible object, and eye consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the sensory element of the eyes.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩrna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the sensory element of the ears.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the sensory element of the eyes as a sign.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the sensory element of the eyes.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the sensory element of the nose.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the sensory element of the nose as a sign.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the sensory element of the nose.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩlce'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the sensory element of the tongue.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the sensory element of the tongue as a sign.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the sensory element of the tongue.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the sensory element of the body.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the characteristics of the composite of contact through the body.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the composite of contact through the body.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩyid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the composite of contact through the mind.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the characteristics of the composite of contact through the mind.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin du mi @33a *//üîΩrtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin du mi @33a *// rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the composite of contact through the mind.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩmig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the sensation that arises from the composite of contact through the eye.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the characteristics of the sensation that arises from the composite of contact through the eye.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the sensation that arises from the composite of contact through the eye.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the sensation that arises from the composite of contact through the ear.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the defining mark of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the coming together of the ear.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the coming together of the ear.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the coming together of the nose.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the defining mark of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the coming together of the nose.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the coming together of the nose.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the coming together of the tongue.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the defining mark of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the coming together of the tongue.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the coming together of the tongue.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩlus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about feelings that arise from the condition of the contact of the body.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the attributes of feelings that arise from the condition of the contact of the body.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi @33b rtog go /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi @33b rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of feelings that arise from the condition of the contact of the body.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about feelings that arise from the condition of the contact of the mind.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the attributes of feelings that arise from the condition of the contact of the mind.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩsa'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩsa'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / sa'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / sa'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of feelings that arise from the condition of the contact of the mind.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the earth element.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the attributes of the earth element.

original: sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the earth element.

original: chu'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩchu'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: chu'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / chu'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the water element.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the water element‚Äôs attributes.

original: chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the water element‚Äôs nature.

original: me'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩme'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: me'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / me'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the fire element.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the fire element‚Äôs attributes.

original: me'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: me'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the fire element‚Äôs nature.

original: rlung gi khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩrlung gi khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rlung gi khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / rlung gi khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the wind element.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the wind element‚Äôs attributes.

original: rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the wind element‚Äôs nature.

original: nam mkha'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩnam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the space element.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the space element‚Äôs attributes.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the space element‚Äôs nature.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩrnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form concepts or construct ideas about the element of consciousness.üîΩThey do not form concepts or construct ideas about the attributes of the element of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form concepts or construct ideas about the nature of the element of consciousness.

original: ma rig par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩ@34a *// ma rig pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: ma rig par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / @34a *// ma rig pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form concepts or construct ideas about ignorance.üîΩThey do not form concepts or construct ideas about the attributes of ignorance.

original: ma rig pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form concepts or construct ideas about the nature of ignorance.

original: 'du byed du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩ'du byed kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: 'du byed du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / 'du byed kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form concepts or construct ideas about volitional factors.üîΩThey do not form concepts or construct ideas about the attributes of volitional factors.

original: 'du byed kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩrnam par shes par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩrnam par shes pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / rnam par shes par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form concepts or construct ideas about the nature of volitional factors.üîΩThey do not form concepts or construct ideas about consciousness.üîΩThey do not form concepts or construct ideas about the attributes of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form concepts or construct ideas about the nature of consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩming dang gzugs kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / ming dang gzugs kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about name and form.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the attributes of name and form.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of name and form.

original: skye mched drug tu mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: skye mched drug tu mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the six sense sources.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the attributes of the six sense sources.

original: skye mched drug gi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go ;skye mched drug gi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: skye mched drug gi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go ;skye mched drug gi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the six sense sources.

original: reg par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩreg pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: reg par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / reg pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /

original: reg pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: reg pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of contact.

original: tshor bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩtshor ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: tshor bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / tshor ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about sensation.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the attributes of sensation.

original: tshor ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: tshor ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of sensation.

original: sred par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: sred par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about craving.

original: sred pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: sred pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about craving as a sign.

original: sred pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: sred pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of craving.

original: len par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: len par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about grasping.

original: len pa'i @34b mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: len pa'i @34b mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about grasping as a sign.

original: len pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: len pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of grasping.

original: srid par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩsrid pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: srid par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / srid pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about becoming.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about becoming as a sign.

original: srid pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: srid pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of becoming.

original: skye bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: skye bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about birth.

original: skye ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: skye ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about birth as a sign.

original: skye ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩrga shir mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩrga shi'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: skye ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / rga shir mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / rga shi'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /

original: rga shi'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rga shi'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of old age and death.

original: 'dod pa'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩ'dod pa'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / 'dod pa'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the desire realm.üîΩThey do not form mental constructs or concepts about the characteristics of the desire realm.

original: 'dod pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the nature of the desire realm.

original: gzugs kyi khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩgzugs kyi khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / gzugs kyi khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the form realm.üîΩThey do not form mental constructs or concepts about the characteristics of the form realm.

original: gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the nature of the form realm.

original: gzugs med pa'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩgzugs med pa'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the formless realm.üîΩThey do not form mental constructs or concepts about the characteristics of the formless realm.

original: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩsbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the nature of the formless realm.üîΩThey do not form mental constructs or concepts about the perfection of generosity.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the characteristics of the perfection of generosity.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rtog rnam par @35a *//üîΩmi rtog go /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rtog rnam par @35a *// mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the perfection of moral discipline.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the perfection of moral discipline as a sign.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the perfection of moral discipline as a nature.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the perfection of patience.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the perfection of patience as a sign.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the perfection of patience as a nature.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the perfection of perseverance.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the perfection of perseverance as a sign.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts in relation to the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts in relation to the perfection of concentration.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts in relation to the attributes of the perfection of concentration.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts in relation to the intrinsic nature of the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts in relation to the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts in relation to the attributes of the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts in relation to the intrinsic nature of the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩnang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts in relation to inner emptiness.üîΩThey do not form mental constructs or concepts in relation to the attributes of inner emptiness.

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts in relation to the intrinsic nature of inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the emptiness of the external as the emptiness of the external.

original: @35b phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: @35b phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the emptiness of the external as a sign of the emptiness of the external.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩphyi nang stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / phyi nang stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the emptiness of the external as the nature of the emptiness of the external.üîΩ‚ÄúThey do not think or conceptualize about the emptiness of the external and internal as the emptiness of the external and internal.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the emptiness of the external and internal as a sign of the emptiness of the external and internal.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the emptiness of the external and internal as the nature of the emptiness of the external and internal.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam bar mi rtog go /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam bar mi rtog go /
translated: ‚ÄúThey do not think or conceptualize about the emptiness of emptiness as the emptiness of emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the emptiness of emptiness as a sign of the emptiness of emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the emptiness of emptiness as the nature of the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the emptiness of great extent as the emptiness of great extent.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the emptiness of the great as a sign.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the emptiness of the great as a nature.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the emptiness of the ultimate.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the emptiness of the ultimate as a sign.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the emptiness of the ultimate as a nature.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the emptiness of the conditioned as a sign.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the emptiness of the conditioned as a nature.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the emptiness of the unconditioned as a sign.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize it as the nature of the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩmtha' las 'das pa stong pa @36a *//üîΩnyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa @36a *// nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize it as the emptiness beyond extremes.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize it as the sign of the emptiness beyond extremes.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize it as the nature of the emptiness beyond extremes.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize it as the emptiness of what is endless and beginningless.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize it as the sign of the emptiness of what is endless and beginningless.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize it as the nature of the emptiness of what is endless and beginningless.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize it as the emptiness of nonrepudiation.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize it as the sign of the emptiness of nonrepudiation.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize it as the emptiness that is nothing to be discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize it as the emptiness of nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize the emptiness of nature as a sign.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize the emptiness of nature as the emptiness of nature.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize all phenomena as emptiness.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize all phenomena as emptiness as a sign.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩrang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize all phenomena as emptiness as the emptiness of all phenomena.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize the emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize the emptiness of defining characteristics as a sign.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩmi dmigs pa stong pa @36b nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / mi dmigs pa stong pa @36b nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the emptiness of nonapprehension.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the attributes of the emptiness of nonapprehension.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the emptiness of nonapprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩdngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the emptiness of things not existing.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the attributes of the emptiness of things not existing.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the emptiness of things not existing.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the emptiness of essential nature.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the attributes of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the emptiness that is the nonexistence of entities.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the sign of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of entities.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of entities.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the applications of mindfulness.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag ba rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag ba rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the sign of the applications of mindfulness.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the correct exertions.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the sign of the correct exertions.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the correct exertions.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the bases of supernatural powers.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩrdzu 'phrul gyi @37a *//üîΩrkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / rdzu 'phrul gyi @37a *// rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the representations of the bases of supernatural powers.üîΩThey do not form mental constructs or concepts about the essential nature of the bases of supernatural powers.

original: dbang po rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩdbang po rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: dbang po rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / dbang po rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the faculties.üîΩThey do not form mental constructs or concepts about the representations of the faculties.

original: dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩstobs rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / stobs rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the essential nature of the faculties.üîΩThey do not form mental constructs or concepts about the powers.

original: stobs rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the representations of the powers.

original: stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the essential nature of the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the branches of enlightenment.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go ;byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go ;byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the defining characteristics of the aspects of enlightenment. They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the aspects of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩ'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the noble eightfold path.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the defining characteristics of the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩ'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the truths of the noble ones.üîΩThey do not think or conceptualize about the defining characteristics of the truths of the noble ones.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the nature of the truths of the noble ones.

original: bsam gtan rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the meditative stabilities.

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the defining characteristics of the meditative stabilities.

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi @37b rtog go /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi @37b rtog go /
translated: They do not conceptualize or falsely identify the meditative concentrations.

original: tshad med pa rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not conceptualize or falsely identify the immeasurables.

original: tshad med pa rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not conceptualize or falsely identify the signs of the immeasurables.

original: tshad med pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not conceptualize or falsely identify the intrinsic nature of the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not conceptualize or falsely identify the formless absorptions.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not conceptualize or falsely identify the signs of the formless absorptions.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩrnam par thar pa brgyad du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩrnam par thar pa brgyad kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / rnam par thar pa brgyad du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not conceptualize or falsely identify the intrinsic nature of the formless absorptions.üîΩThey do not conceptualize or falsely identify the eight aspects of liberation.üîΩThey do not conceptualize or falsely identify the signs of the eight aspects of liberation.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not conceptualize or falsely identify the intrinsic nature of the eight aspects of liberation.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩmthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the nine serial steps of meditative absorption.üîΩThey do not form mental constructs or concepts about the attributes of the nine serial steps of meditative absorption.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the essential nature of the nine serial steps of meditative absorption.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩrnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about emptiness, signlessness, or aspirationlessness as doors to liberation.üîΩThey do not form mental constructs or concepts about the attributes of emptiness, signlessness, or aspirationlessness as doors to liberation.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩmngon par shes pa @38a *//
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / mngon par shes pa @38a *//
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the essential nature of emptiness, signlessness, or aspirationlessness as doors to liberation.

original: rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas.üîΩThey do not form mental constructs or concepts about the four kinds of intrepid confidence, the four kinds of correct understanding, great love, great compassion, or the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the higher knowledges.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the intrinsic nature of the higher knowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the meditative stabilizations.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the signs of the meditative stabilizations.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the intrinsic nature of the meditative stabilizations.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think or conceptualize about the signs of the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /

analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhir mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / mi 'jigs pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /

analyzed: mi 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the nature of the four fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhir mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩso so yang dag par rig pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhir mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / so so yang dag par rig pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the four kinds of correct understanding.üîΩThey do not form mental constructs or concepts about the attributes of the four kinds of correct understanding.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the nature of the four kinds of correct understanding.

analyzed: byams pa chen por mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / byams pa chen po'i mtshan mar mi @38b rtog rnam par mi rtog go /

analyzed: byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /

analyzed: snying rje chen po'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go ;snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /

analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo //

translated: the purity of the ear consciousness, the purity of the nose consciousness, the purity of the tongue consciousness, the purity of the body consciousness, the purity of the mind consciousness, the purity of eye contact,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dag pa dang / sa'i khams dag pa dang / chu'i khams dag pa dang / me'i khams dag pa dang / rlung gi khams dag pa dang / nam mkha'i khams dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dag pa dang /

translated: the purity of the earth element, the purity of the water element, the purity of the fire element, the purity of the wind element, the purity of the space element, and the purity of the consciousness element,

original: ma rig pa dag pa dang / 'du byed dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / ming dang gzugs dag pa dang / skye mched drug dag pa dang / reg pa dag pa dang / tshor ba dag pa dang / sred pa dag pa dang /
analyzed: ma rig pa dag pa dang / 'du byed dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / ming dang gzugs dag pa dang / skye mched drug dag pa dang / reg pa dag pa dang / tshor ba dag pa dang / sred pa dag pa dang /
translated: the purity of ignorance, the purity of volitional factors, the purity of consciousness, the purity of name and form, the purity of the six sense fields, the purity of contact, the purity of feeling, the purity of craving,

original: len pa dag pa dang / srid pa dag pa dang / skye ba dag pa dang / rga shi dag pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / tshul @46a *//
analyzed: len pa dag pa dang / srid pa dag pa dang / skye ba dag pa dang / rga shi dag pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / tshul @46a *//
translated: the purity of grasping, the purity of existence, the purity of birth, the purity of old age and death, the purity of the perfection of generosity, the purity of the perfection of conduct,

original: khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang /üîΩnang stong pa nyid dag pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid dag pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dag pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid dag pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang /
analyzed: khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dag pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid dag pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dag pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid dag pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang /
translated: the perfection of discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of diligence, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom;üîΩinner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, the emptiness of ultimate reality,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dag pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dag pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang /
translated: the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of beginning and end, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of nonexistence;

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dag pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dag pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang /üîΩngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dag pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dag pa dang /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dag pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dag pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dag pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dag pa dang /
translated: the purity of the emptiness of inherent existence, the purity of the emptiness of all phenomena, the purity of the emptiness of defining characteristics, the purity of the emptiness of nonapprehension, the purity of the emptiness of nonexistence,üîΩthe purity of the emptiness of essential nature, the purity of the emptiness of the essential nature of nonexistence, the purity of the applications of mindfulness, the purity of the right efforts, the purity of the legs of miraculous power,

original: dbang po dag pa dang / stobs dag pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dag pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dag pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dag pa dang / bsam gtan @46b dag pa dang / tshad med pa dag pa dang /
analyzed: dbang po dag pa dang / stobs dag pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dag pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dag pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dag pa dang / bsam gtan @46b dag pa dang / tshad med pa dag pa dang /
translated: the purity of the faculties, the purity of the powers, the purity of the branches of awakening, the purity of the noble eightfold path, the purity of the noble truths, the purity of the concentrations, the purity of the immeasurables,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag pa dang / rnam par thar pa dag pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dag pa dang /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag pa dang / rnam par thar pa dag pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dag pa dang /

analyzed: mngon par shes pa dag pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dag pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dag pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dag pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dag pa dang /
translated: the pure aspects of the superknowledges, the pure aspects of the meditative stabilizations, the pure aspects of the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways, the pure aspects of the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas, the pure aspects of the four fearlessnesses, the pure aspects of the four detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: byams pa chen po dag pa dang / snying rje chen po dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dag pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dag pa dang /

analyzed: nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /

analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba nyid kyas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage will never be separated from the transcendent perfection of generosity until they have attained manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
