original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will never be separated from the transcendent perfection of tolerance.üîΩThey will never be separated from the transcendent perfection of perseverance.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro; ;bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //

translated: They will never be separated from the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will never be separated from the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will never be separated from inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //üîΩphyi nang stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro // phyi nang stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will never be separated from external emptiness.üîΩThey will never be separated from the emptiness of external and internal.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang nam yang @50b bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang nam yang @50b bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will never be separated from the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will never be separated from great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //üîΩ'dus byas stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro // 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will never be separated from the emptiness of ultimate reality.üîΩThey will never be separated from the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //üîΩmtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will never be separated from the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.üîΩThey will never be separated from the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will never be separated from the emptiness of non-discarded phenomena.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will never be separated from the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will never be separated from the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //üîΩmi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will never be separated from the emptiness of defining characteristics.üîΩHe will never be separated from the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //üîΩngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will never be separated from the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will never be separated from the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will never be separated from the legs of miraculous power.

original: dbang po rnams dang rnam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbang po rnams dang rnam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and the faculties.

original: stobs rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stobs rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams @51a *//üîΩdang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams @51a *// dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and the noble truths.

original: bsam gtan rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and the meditative stabilities.

original: tshad med pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and the immeasurable aspirations.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and the formless meditative stabilities.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
